headline: Cognizant Recognized as Pega Partner of the Year for Advancing AI-Powered Enterprise Transformation
summary: Cognizant (NASDAQ: CTSH) has been named Partner of the Year by Pegasystems, Inc., a global leader in enterprise software, at the annual PegaWorld 2025 conference. The award recognizes Cognizant's outstanding contributions to enterprise transformation through its long-standing collaboration with Pega, with an emphasis on delivery excellence, innovation and client success.
